notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: YARB, AIMC, and FAR development throughout the course of this work, from planning, fieldwork, interviews, data analysis, and writing of this paper. AIMC is the corresponding author and main coordinator of the research project study. AIMC, AC, FAR, and MRC are experts in ethnobiology, ornithology, and local knowledge themes and assisted paper writing. All authors read and approved the final manuscript author contributions.

sec.title: Author’s information
sec.p: AIMC and FAR are researchers at the Escuela Nacional de Estudios Superiores, Morelia. AC is full time researcher at Instituto de Investigaciones en Ecosistemas y Sustentabilidad, UNAM. YARB is the first author at te Escuela Nacional de Estudios Superiores Unidad Morelia. MRC is a local expert in birds in Zapotitlán Salinas, Puebla,
